fields.name: blocks
fields.label: Page Blocks
fields.description: Add and arrange content blocks to build your page

fields.name: heading
fields.label: Heading
fields.description: Main headline text (5-10 words for impact)

fields.name: ctaText
fields.label: CTA Button Text
fields.description: Call-to-action button text (leave empty to hide)

fields.name: glassEffect
fields.label: Glass Effect
fields.description: Add frosted glass effect behind content

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link URL
fields.description: Optional link for the feature card

fields.name: contentLeft
fields.label: Content (Left/Main)
fields.description: Main text content or left column

fields.name: contentRight
fields.label: Content (Right)
fields.description: Right column content (only for two-column layout)

fields.name: image
fields.label: Background Image
fields.description: Required unless using a video background

fields.name: hero
fields.label: Hero Section (Legacy)
fields.description: Legacy field - use Page Blocks instead

fields.name: ogImage
fields.label: Social Share Image
fields.description: Image for social media sharing (1200x630 recommended)

fields.name: body
fields.label: Body Content (Legacy)
fields.description: Legacy field - use Page Blocks instead

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
